extDescription.message: Quickly switch between customized search engines; Add a custom search engine in the right-click menu. New AI model support.

optionsSortIdTip.message: After saving, the field will be sorted from small to large

optionsInPopupTip.message: When selected, it will be displayed on the popup page (click the plug-in in the upper right corner of the browser to pop up the page)

inRightTip.message: When selected, it will be displayed in the right-click menu (if only one is selected, it will appear in the top-level right-click menu)

inShortcutsTip.message: When selected, the shortcut key can be switched in the search engine. For example, on the Baidu search page, press the shortcut key to quickly switch to Google search

tabTip.message: Press Tab to switch engine, enter to search. Alt/MacCtrl+S to toggle search.

inTooltipTip.message: Whether to display in the shortcut menu?

select2clipboardTip.message: Whether text is automatically copied to the clipboard when selected?

showTooltipTip.message: Whether to display a shortcut menu after selecting text

showTooltip.message: Display a shortcut menu after selecting text

showTopSearchSwitchTip.message: Whether to display a shortcut toggle menu at the top of the search page (depends on it is in popup page)

showTopSearchSwitch.message: Top switch menu in search page

searchInNewTabTip.message: Open a new tab to search.

historyDaysTip.message: Search history from how many days ago.

refresh.message: It takes effect after the page is refreshed.

comment.message: If you like it, please give a comment, thanks! Click here. ðŸ˜Š

readme.message:
The default one-click switch search shortcut is (win)Alt+S (mac)Ctrl+S.
But sometimes it will set failed, please set it by yourself, open chrome://extensions/shortcuts.
It is recommended to configure activate extension shortcuts, open chrome://extensions/shortcuts, such as Ctrl/Cmd+K, to open the search bar more quickly. ðŸ˜‰

welcomeContribute.message: You are more than welcome to contribute code to improve the tool.

llmConfigApiKey.message: API Key: Your LLM service secret key.

llmConfigPrompt.message: Prompt: User prompt template, supports {content} placeholder.

llmConfigSystemPrompt.message: System Prompt: System-level prompt, affects model behavior.

llmConfigMaxTokens.message: Max Tokens: Maximum length of the response.

llmConfigTemperature.message: Temperature: Sampling temperature, higher means more randomness.

llmConfigMenus.message: You can customize multiple prompt menus for quick switching.

popupSuggestEnabledTip.message: Enable or disable search suggestions in the popup window

popupSuggestEngineTip.message: Choose which engine to use for suggestions in popup (Bing or Google)

popupHistoryEnabledTip.message: Enable or disable matching history and bookmarks in popup

popupHistoryDaysTip.message: Default days for matching history records in popup

llmPrompt.message:
Here is the full text of a web page. Please read it carefully and provide a concise summary of the main points and key information. Output the summary in innerHTML format.
{content}

llmSystemPrompt.message:
You are an AI assistant specialized in summarizing web page content. When given the full text of a web page, your task is to generate a concise and accurate summary of the main points and key information. Output the summary in clear, well-structured English, formatted as innerHTML (using appropriate HTML tags such as

,
    ,
  • ,

    , etc.).

enableSummarizeTip.message: Enable to use the summarize full page feature in the context menu. API Key and Endpoint are required.

llmModelsJsonTip.message:
Please enter the model configuration (JSON) below. Multiple models are supported. Each model should include: active, endpoint, method, headers, bodyParams, responseParser. 
Please delete the comments in the JSON file before using it. If you want to use the default model, please set active to true. Otherwise, set it to false.
